description: This Dart source file defines the `EventsService` class, which provides methods to add and watch event data stored in Firestore. It uses Firebase Firestore SDK for database interactions and references models and services related to Firebase and events.

classes.name: EventsService
classes.description: A service class for managing events in Firestore, including adding events and listening to changes in the events collection.

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Adds a new event to Firestore if Firebase has been initialized.

methods.name: watchEvents
methods.description: Returns a stream of event lists, updating in real-time as the Firestore collection changes.
